text: Ha bomalimabe bo aparela motho, o bitsa ho Mong`a hae ka ts’okoloho le boinyatso. Empa hang hoba A mo nehe molemo o tsoang ho Eena, eba o iteballa ka seo a neng a se rapella pele, a be a iketsetse melingoana khahlanong le Allah, kahoo a khelose batho tseleng ea Allah. E re: “Nyakalla nyelisong ea hau ha nakoana. Hobane u e mong oa balekane ba Mollo.”
